forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Clearing late. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Decreasing clouds with mostly clear skies late. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
